ExpSyntax.val: 'inner join RO_Kontakt_Fachhaendler fh on (g.Ebene1=fh.Ebene1 and g.Ebene2=fh.Ebene2 and g.Ebene3=fh.Ebene3 and g.Ebene4=fh.Ebene4 and g.Fachhndler_Nr=fh.Fachhaendler and fh.ProjektNummer='&Trim(Str({32768,1115},'10'))&' and fh.EMailAdresse='''&Trim({32768,1119})&''')'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select distinct p.Auftrags_Datum, gz.Hostname, p.AUFTNR, g.Serien_Nr, k.Matchcode, ABS(isnull(p.Bestellmenge,0))-abs(isnull(p.Liefermenge,0)) as Offen, p.IDNR, ak.BestellNrr, ak.Datum, ak.Erstell_Uhrzeit, v.ShipcloudStatus, v.ShipcloudStatusDatum, v.ShipcloudStatusZeit, CASE WHEN sh.StatusSmartmanager IS NULL AND al.LieferscheinDatum IS NOT NULL AND v.AuftragNr IS NULL THEN 99 ELSE isnull(sh.StatusSmartmanager,10) END as StatusSmartmanager, isnull(ak.Lieferanschrift_1,'') as Name1, isnull(ak.Lieferanschrift_2,'') as Name2, isnull(ak.Lieferanschrift_3,'') as Name3, ak.Lieferstraee, ak.Liefer_Plz, ak.Liefer_Ort, iz.Gebaeude, iz.Stockwerk, iz.Raum
from positionen p WITH(NOLOCK) inner join Ebene4 e WITH(NOLOCK) on e.Ebene1=p.Ebene1 and e.Ebene2=p.Ebene2 and e.Ebene3=p.Ebene3 and e.Ebene4=p.Ebene4 inner join geraete g WITH(NOLOCK) on (p.Ebene1=g.Ebene1 and p.Ebene2=g.Ebene2 and p.Ebene3=g.Ebene3 and p.Ebene4=g.Ebene4 and p.IDNR = g.IDNR) inner join GERAETE_ZUSATZ gz WITH(NOLOCK) on (p.Ebene1=gz.Ebene1 and p.Ebene2=gz.Ebene2 and p.Ebene3=gz.Ebene3 and p.Ebene4=gz.Ebene4 and p.IDNR = gz.IDNR) inner join IDNR_ZUSATZ iz WITH(NOLOCK) on (p.Ebene1=iz.Ebene1 and p.Ebene2=iz.Ebene2 and p.Ebene3=iz.Ebene3 and p.Ebene4=iz.Ebene4 and p.IDNR = iz.IDNR)
inner join AUFTRAGKOPF ak WITH(NOLOCK) on (ak.Ebene1=p.Ebene1 and ak.Ebene2=p.Ebene2 and ak.Ebene3=p.Ebene3 and ak.Ebene4=p.Ebene4 and ak.AuftragsNr =p.AUFTNR) inner join AUFTRAG_LFSNR al WITH(NOLOCK) on (al.Ebene1=p.Ebene1 and al.Ebene2=p.Ebene2 and al.Ebene3=p.Ebene3 and al.Ebene4=p.Ebene4 and al.AuftragsNr =p.AUFTNR) inner join kunden k WITH(NOLOCK) on (k.Ebene1=CASE WHEN ak.ZentraleLieferAdr = 1 THEN e.ZentralEbene1 ELSE ak.Ebene1 END and k.Ebene2=CASE WHEN ak.ZentraleLieferAdr = 1 THEN e.ZentralEbene2 ELSE ak.Ebene2 END and k.Ebene3=CASE WHEN ak.ZentraleLieferAdr = 1 THEN e.ZentralEbene3 ELSE ak.Ebene3 END and k.Ebene4=CASE WHEN ak.ZentraleLieferAdr = 1 THEN e.ZentralEbene4 ELSE ak.Ebene4 END and k.KDNR = ak.Lieferanschrift_Nr)
inner join SM_Kontakt_Kunde pk WITH(NOLOCK) on (pk.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and pk.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and pk.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and pk.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and pk.KDNR=ak.Lieferanschrift_Nr and pk.Projekt=:7 and pk.aktiv=1) left outer join versand_etik_kopf v WITH(NOLOCK) on (v.Ebene1=p.Ebene1 and v.Ebene2=p.Ebene2 and v.Ebene3=p.Ebene3 and v.Ebene4=p.Ebene4 and v.VorgangNr = ak.VersandVorgangsNr) left outer join SHIPCLOUD_STATUS_SM sh WITH(NOLOCK) on (sh.Ebene1=p.Ebene1 and sh.Ebene2=p.Ebene2 and sh.Ebene3=p.Ebene3 and sh.Ebene4=p.Ebene4 and sh.StatusShipcloud=v.ShipcloudStatus) inner join GESCHAEFTSFALL2 gf WITH(NOLOCK) on (gf.Ebene1=e.ZentralEbene1 and gf.Ebene2=e.ZentralEbene2 and gf.Ebene3=e.ZentralEbene3 and gf.Ebene4=e.ZentralEbene4 and gf.Fall=ak.Geschaeftsfall and gf.SMARTmanager=1) :8 where p.Ebene1=:1 and p.Ebene2=:2 and p.Ebene3=:3 and p.Ebene4=:4 and p.Auftrags_Datum>':5' and Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0 and pk.EMailAdresse=':6' order by AUFTNR
